home-description: Join GreenT and be part of a community dedicated to reducing plastic waste. Connect with like-minded individuals, exchange plastics, and make a real difference.
home-nav-description: Join GreenT today and start your journey towards a plastic-free future.
login-form-description: Login to continue cleaning our planet.
signup-form-description: Sign up to join the movement to clean our planet.
profile-description: Your account summary and recent activities.
posted-plastics-no-posts: No posts yet, try adding your first post!
Search posts, users or plastic types...
about-description: Connecting those who have plastic materials with those who need them, creating a more sustainable future through efficient recycling.
about-description-connecting-providers-s: Our platform brings together individuals and businesses who have accumulated plastic materials (bottles, bags, and other recyclables) with those who need them. Whether you're looking to dispose of plastics responsibly or need a steady supply for recycling or repurposing, our app makes the process seamless and efficient.
about-how-it-works-description: Our platform is designed to make recycling easy and efficient for everyone.
about-how-it-works-signup-login-descript: Create an account and specify whether you're providing or seeking plastics.
about-how-it-works-list-plastic-descript: Providers can log the type and amount of plastic they have available.
about-how-it-works-find-match-descriptio: Seekers can browse available plastics and contact providers directly.
about-how-it-works-coordinate-exchange-d: Communicate, arrange pickups, and contribute to a more sustainable environment.
about-why-choose-platform-efficiency-des: Instantly locate plastic providers or seekers near you, saving time and resources.
about-why-choose-platform-sustainability: Reduce plastic waste by ensuring it is collected and repurposed properly.
about-why-choose-platform-community-desc: Connect with individuals and businesses committed to eco-friendly solutions.
about-why-choose-platform-easy-communica: Integrated messaging features allow seamless coordination between users.
about-faq-answer-1: Anyone! Whether you are an individual, a recycling business, or an organization in need of plastic materials, you can sign up and start connecting.
about-faq-answer-2: Yes, it is free to use! You can sign up and start connecting with others.
about-faq-question-3: How do I ensure the plastic I receive is clean and usable?
about-faq-answer-3: We have a strict verification process to ensure the plastic is clean and usable. All plastic materials are inspected by our team before being listed on the platform.
about-faq-question-4: What happens after I connect with someone?
about-faq-answer-4: Once you connect with someone, you can start coordinating the exchange of plastic materials. We provide a secure and easy-to-use platform for you to communicate and finalize the exchange.
about-faq-question-5: How do I get paid for the plastic I sell?
about-faq-answer-5: After the exchange is completed, you will receive the amount of points based on your quantity of plastic sold. Check how points are assigned in the 'How it works' section.
about-faq-question-6: How does this help the environment?
about-faq-answer-6: By connecting plastic seekers with plastic providers, we reduce the amount of plastic waste in the environment. This helps to preserve the environment and reduce the amount of plastic waste.
about-faq-question-7: How do I redeem my points?
about-faq-answer-7: You can find the redeem points section in your profile page. Give it a try from here!
about-faq-question-8: How do I contact the platform?
about-faq-answer-8: You can contact the platform by going to the 'Contact' us section in the footer.

steps.title: Sign Up
steps.description: Create your GreenT account to join our eco-friendly community

steps.title: Connect

steps.title: Exchange
steps.description: Meet with other users to complete the plastic exchange

postingGuide.title: Creating Quality Posts
postingGuide.subtitle: Help others find your plastics with clear information

clearPhotos.title: Take Clear Photos
tips: Use good lighting to show the true condition
Include multiple angles of the plastic items
Show the quantity clearly in at least one photo

detailedDescriptions.title: Write Detailed Descriptions
tips: Specify the type of plastic (bottles, bags, etc.)
Include your general location for pickup
Add any special notes about the items

reminder.title: Important Reminder
reminder.text: Always include your contact number in your profile or posts to make coordination easier. If you prefer privacy, you can use the in-app messaging system.

rewards.title: Points Rewards System
rewards.subtitle: Earn points for every plastic item you recycle or exchange

items: Redeem eco-friendly products from our partners
Earn badges and improve your GreenT profile status

items: Follow our social media for challenges
Partner with friends for bigger collections

items.question: How do I verify my account?
items.answer: After signing up, check your email for a verification link. Click the link to complete the verification process.

items.question: Can I exchange plastics for money?
items.answer: GreenT focuses on community exchange and points rewards. Some partners may offer cash for large quantities.

items.question: How are points calculated for mixed plastic items?
items.answer: Mixed items are assessed based on type, condition, and quantity. Our system provides an estimate during posting.

cta.title: Ready to make a difference?
cta.text: Join GreenT today and start your journey towards a plastic-free future.
